synopsis.text: On an ordinary day, Suzuko's life takes an extraordinary turn when a massive gas explosion in Tokyo catapults her into the heart of Japan's Sengoku period. In this unfamiliar and war-torn era, Suzuko is rescued from marauding bandits by Shukumaru, a young man scavenging for food for his starving village. Despite the harsh realities of her new surroundings, Suzuko remains determined to find her missing sibling, Shu, who was with her during the explosion. As she navigates through the bloodshed and chaos of the past, Suzuko finds herself inexplicably drawn to Shukumaru, whose rough exterior hides a kind heart. With Shukumaru by her side, Suzuko embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth behind her time-travel and unravel the mysteries surrounding her own past. As the boundaries between past and present blur, Suzuko must find a way to return to her own time while navigating the treacherous path laid out before her in this thrilling and enigmatic adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
